title: Repo.file_has_content() broken in V6 unlocked mode
body:
In a V6 repo, for a file under annex that has content present:

```
In [5]: ds.repo.file_has_content('sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w_defacemask.nii.gz')
Out[5]: False

In [6]: ds.get('sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w_defacemask.nii.gz')
Out[6]: 
[{'action': 'get',
  'message': 'already present',
  'path': '/media/mih/C799-BE4A/test/studyforrest-data-structural_alt/sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w_defacemask.nii.gz',
  'refds': '/media/mih/C799-BE4A/test/studyforrest-data-structural_alt',
  'status': 'notneeded',
  'type': 'file'}]

In [7]: ds.repo.file_has_content('sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w_defacemask.nii.gz')
Out[7]: False
```

`get` works correctly, but `file_has_content()` is wrong both times.

Now the same for a file that initially has no content:

```
In [8]: ds.repo.file_has_content('sub-01/anat/sub-01_T2w_defacemask.nii.gz')
Out[8]: False

In [9]: ds.get('sub-01/anat/sub-01_T2w_defacemask.nii.gz')
Out[9]:                                                                                      
[{'action': 'get',
  'annexkey': 'MD5E-s152016--ef9df2a35bc7c08fe028653e2f9c9b1b.nii.gz',
  'message': 'from mddatasrc...',
  'path': '/media/mih/C799-BE4A/test/studyforrest-data-structural_alt/sub-01/anat/sub-01_T2w_defacemask.nii.gz',
  'refds': '/media/mih/C799-BE4A/test/studyforrest-data-structural_alt',
  'status': 'ok',
  'type': 'file'}]

In [10]: ds.repo.file_has_content('sub-01/anat/sub-01_T2w_defacemask.nii.gz')
Out[10]: False
```

It gets it properly, but still reports the content absent afterwards. Any test that relies on this check will be a false positive failure.
